description: Angel`s assigned partner in the Special Security Force. Injured during a pursuit of the Red May terrorists, he voluntarily allows himself to receive cybernetic enhancements in the anime. His new powers allow him to fight Lucifer to standstill. Afterwards, he forces Angel to kill him by causing his suit to detonate, destroying Lucifer in the process. Raiden`s story differs in the manga, where Angel becomes cybernetic instead of him.
name: Sakada Raiden
